content:
# It appears that I successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, but after attempting to craft the Assembling Machine, it seems that the crafting operation did not succeed.
# My final inventory after the crafting attempt shows:
# - 5 iron gear wheels
# - 5 coal
# 
# However, I still have no iron plates, which are essential for crafting the Assembling Machine.

# Since I have iron ore, I need to smelt it into iron plates. 
# I will insert the iron ore into the furnace for smelting and ensure it has enough coal for fuel.

# Insert iron ore into the furnace for smelting
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)

# Insert coal into the furnace for fuel
insert_item(Prototype.Coal, furnace, quantity=5)

# Wait for the smelting process to complete to ensure I get enough iron plates.
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(furnace).get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 3:
        break
    sleep(1)

# After smelting, I will check the inventory to see if I have enough iron plates to craft the Assembling Machine.
if inspect_inventory().get(Prototype.IronPlate, 0) >= 3:
    craft_item(Prototype.AssemblingMachine1)  # Craft 1 Assembling Machine

# Finally, confirm the final inventory after crafting.
final_inventory = inspect_inventory()
print(f"Final inventory after crafting assembling machine: {final_inventory}")
